name: Just A Crane Game
description:
Version 0.34

- WASD: Move

- SPACE: Select/Grab/Release

Just A Crane Game is a physics based game currently in development on the Unity engine. The game will feature a variety of mini-games as well as a collection room to house all your prizes. And more content is being thought up all the time. As of 0.34, the crane is functional and there is a basic version of the main "collection" game as well as two mini-game ideas. Any feedback on the control and feel so far is encouraged and will be taken into consideration. The goal here is to create a game that while frustrating and not entirely reliable, can be heaps of fun.

Note: If you stumbled upon this from elsewhere, feel free to follow @MousemeatGames on Twitter for consistent updates on this and other projects. Any support whatsoever is truly appreciated and helps me continue to devote my time to new and improved content.
